titles.title: To authorize conveyance of 2 decommissioned Coast Guard vessels to Canvasback Mission, Inc., for use for provision of medical services.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Maritime Transportation.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 5/20/1998--Introduced. Directs the Commandant of the Coast Guard to convey all right, title, and interest of the United States in and to two specified decommissioned vessels to Canvasback Mission, Inc., in Oregon, under specified conditions.
